parameters.name: handleInvalid
parameters.description: how to handle invalid entries. Options are skip (filter out rows with invalid values), error (throw an error), or keep (keep invalid values in a special additional bucket).

parameters.name: numBuckets
parameters.description: Number of buckets (quantiles, or categories) into which data points are grouped. Must be >= 2.

parameters.name: relativeError
parameters.description: The relative target precision for the approximate quantile algorithm used to generate buckets. Must be in the range [0, 1].
